Class ScriptUnitSerializer

Namespace
FinScript.Code.Serialization
Assembly
FinScript.Core.dll

Serializer for script units. The major difference from standard FinSysPlatform.NetExtension.Serialization.Serializer is it uses the specific property info provider (FinSysPlatform.NetExtension.Serialization.ISerializedPropertyInfoProvider) to choose properties to serialize. Properties to serialize are:

  1. That have FinSysPlatform.NetExtension.Serialization.StoreAttribute (same to FinSysPlatform.NetExtension.Serialization.SerializedPropertyInfoProviderDefault)
  2. That have attribute with FinSysPlatform.NetExtension.Misc.MetaData.IPropertyDisplayParameters support (f.e. IUnitPropertyAttribute, FinSysPlatform.NetExtension.Attributes.DisplayPropertyAttribute
  3. That have DisplayAttribute
